oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SemiNER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Grzegorz Chrupała FR 7.4 Spoken Language Systems Saarland University Saarbrücken, Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: NER
named entity recognizer
annotation tool
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SemiNER is a semi-supervised Named Entity Recognizer (with pre-trained models for German).
SemiNER ist ein semi-supervised Named Entity Erkenner (trainiert für die Deutsche Sprache).
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Chrupała, G. and Klakow, D. (2010). A Named Entity Labeler for German: exploiting Wikipedia and distributional clusters. In LREC 2010.
